```{r}
library(biooracler)
list_layers("Ocean Temperature")
```

```{r}
dataset_id = "thetao_ssp245_2020_2100_depthmean"

time = c('2080-01-01T00:00:00Z', '2090-01-01T00:00:00Z')

latitude = c(0, 66.5629) 
longitude = c(117.5162,-76.9854) 

constraints = list(time, latitude, longitude)
names(constraints) = c("time", "latitude", "longitude")

variables = "thetao_mean"
              
# fill in here
temp_mean <- download_layers(dataset_id, variables, constraints)
```

```{r}
ggplot()+
  geom_stars(data = st_as_stars(temp_mean))+
  coord_equal()+
  theme_bw()+
  scale_fill_viridis_c()
```
